storyInfo: Atop the wall, Amiya and Manfred do battle, and Horn leads a group of Victorian soldiers to assist Amiya by stalling Manfred in his tracks.

attributes.content: So you're here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ...Manfred?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It seems the Sanguinarch will be greatly disappointed. He detests dark, damp places the most, yet went into the rebels' subterranean nest to seize you personally.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: He must surely have caught up to your friends by now. One wonders if the cries from underground will carry so far up this tower—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You wicked... wicked...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Wicked devil?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No, I don't admire his methods whatsoever. The rebels who died to my cannon fire are far luckier than the ones suffering his torment.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're both just the same!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: In your eyes, maybe so. Whenever you use 'devil' and such to refer to us all, it shows that fear and hatred have long clouded your eyes.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The Victorians regard the Sarkaz as a collective of barbarians reveling in slaughter.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Those who thought like that are now either kneeling before the throne, or are now pale skeletons dried upon the city walls.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You, and Theresis... the army you've led has devastated this city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter how you claim you and the vampire are different, you're both invaders here, hands dripping with blood.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You seem to misunderstand, Cautus of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I'm not solely drawing lines between myself and the Prince of Blood—yes, in a certain respect, his predilections disgust me.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But I, like him, do not work the way all the kings of the Court do.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: When they stand in front of you, they see Her Majesty's successor, and they may treat you with skepticism, curiosity or disgust for it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can only feel vigilance from you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes, Cautus. I simply see you—as a dangerous enemy.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: —Did he just toss a grenade at us?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hold onto the wall!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's his Arts... he's using Arts energy to make shockwaves, he's trying to throw us off the city!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh... can't stand straight—it's like every part of the ground's erupting...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The drones can't get near him! Any closer at all and they lose balance—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Everyone... get behind me!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hrrgh––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A—Amiya, are his Arts fusing with yours?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: He's deliberately narrowed and sharpened his attack. He's breaking down the energy layers I form...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What?! You were able to resist a Draco's flames, though!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: He's familiar with our combat style.;His Arts are targeted at Amiya.

attributes.content: I knew full well you'd come. You think I'd just sit here waiting for you?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: There—There goes another one! It's not just the ground, it's, it's above us, wherever red flashes by, it explodes in midair—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Miss Amiya, can't... can't you use mental Arts?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Can you try and just cram his head with some kind of rubbish?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He's too well-defended, and he's too calm. I can feel the edges of his emotions, but... but right now, his heart only thirsts for victory.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes... his mind isn't set on this battle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He's just waiting for the vampire and defense artillery to destroy the resistance!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Stalling for time? Decent conjecture.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: {@nickname}, I've always been more intrigued by you than that Cautus who lucked into the power of the King.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You've faced graver circumstances than this on the battlefield—the choices you make always seem to be the ones more beneficial to the whole.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Please, tell me, what are you about to do next?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Will you expend all your efforts here to kill me and eliminate a long-term threat, or think of some other way to get around me and save those Victorians below?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Uwaaagh!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Mr. Balin, what's happening up ahead?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Partial collapse in the passageway! Three fighters couldn't escape in time—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Route around it! We're pressing on.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Remember, no matter who we lose on this journey, the rest of us cannot stop.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Up, quick, do you see that train?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: The Sarkaz haven't found us yet, from the looks of it. Let's think of a way to blend in there, and grab the controls—
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Harmo, watch out!!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Sarkaz Crossbowman! They've ambushed us!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Rockrock, one step out and we'll get hit! Best we run back underground!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Going back's... riskier still.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The Commander says our only chance is to get the train moving before the Sarkaz destroy the space underground.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But Harmo...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Captain Harmo gave his life.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I'm in charge now.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Listen. We have to start the train immediately after we interrupt their shelling.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: If I fall, then it's down to the next one—even if just one man's left in the end, we have to get him out of here!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I think this door's almost a lost cause, isn't it?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Commander, we'll hold them off!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Don't. You can't.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Ha, ha... you think we don't know that, Rhodes Islander?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Men of the 13th, with me!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, you're running backwards! Don't be daft—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The—The door's down!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Shoot, shoot! Blow 'em up! Everyone go! We're taking that monster down with us!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Ugh... uaargh—!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: He's... here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The smoke clears, and a figure emerges from the end of the jet-black tunnel.
This monster brandishes no claws, has no twisted limbs, bears no sharp fangs nor keen incisors, nor grows any extraneous feelers.
He seems like nothing more than a young noble whose picture could be in the papers, one who'd speak frankly about Londinium's political and economical situation.
If only... the ground below his feet was not soaked in fresh blood.
What a terrible smell. Your men fight rather too dirty.
Monster...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Don't... Don't you think of getting near the commander...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: M—My hand? Nothing even touched—agh!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Hah... now, this scent's much cozier.
I wouldn't mind... using the only thing of worth in your bodies to give the floor a wash.
The vampire airily lifts a finger, as if holding up a crystal chalice, or following the pulse of a piece of music.
The shadows leap up from beneath him, latching onto the soldiers' bodies, winding about their limbs.
What chilling screams follow are drowned entirely under the liquid that bursts forth.
The concentrated iron reek boring into nasal cavities. Bright red overflowing wherever one looks.
This is the instant the people stood at the tunnel's other end realize...
What chased them was no shadow at all. It was running blood, as thick as could be.
Is this... how Warfarin and Closure used to look?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That's the first thing that pops into your mind?!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Well, what the hell do you want me to think? It's better than being stark terrified, innit?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Run! Run like hell!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Where is the 'King of Sarkaz?'
What are you—
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: I come so far, go to all this trouble for an audience with her, and she cowers behind you frail little creatures, not even daring to meet me?
Agh—!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: ...Amiya.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: He's here for Amiya.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You mean that King whatever he said? You're sure that's Amiya? Isn't Amiya a Cautus?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Forget it, it's not important.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But Amiya's not here...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: That's good.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Um, fair. Even she might not cope best with this monster of a thing.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Wonder if her and the Doctor've almost won... *sigh* What am I thinking? Even if they can shut the city artillery down, we're about to be torn to scraps here.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Vina, what's our plan?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Run.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I don't want to... and I CAN'T die here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.text: Run into the darkness before you. Don't think.
These tunnels will take you anywhere you wish to go.

attributes.content: We can't keep this deadlock up anymore.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, step back.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm going to condense stronger energy. I have to defeat Manfred as quickly as possible.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, please trust me. I've matured a lot since the last time I removed my inhibitors.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I knew I wouldn't let myself fall, just as we entered Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh... his energy is densifying! It's like... like a net, from head, to toe... it's everywhere!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The air's... full of invisible Originium crystals! He's scattering them as beacons for his attacks!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No wonder! It's like invisible drones are throwing bombs all about!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Mr. Feist, you and Closure have to get away... if you get caught up, there'll be nowhere to hide!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You can use more strength than that, Cautus.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I'm forcing my Arts... against this energy flow...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Savor it. I formed this cage myself.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Am I less able to shake it... the more I struggle?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cautus, you said my mind wasn't set on this battle with you. You were only half correct.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I'll deliver you bound before Her Majesty. The Sarkaz in Londinium... are loath to see an outblood flaunting her borrowed power from the King.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I can't, and I don't want to command them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course you can't.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But they shouldn't be commanded by Theresis either.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When I stayed in Kazdel, I saw so many Sarkaz warriors. Plenty of them were mercenaries. After that, at Chernobog... I met them again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even when they were being exploited by Talulah, at least they knew who their enemy in each battle was, and knew they were giving up their lives for a future.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But now? You've trapped them inside a foreign city. Ever since the moment I came, I've sensed their frustration, their anxiety, their bewilderment...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You read my warriors' emotions?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The net's... tightening? Are you angry?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cautus, has anyone ever told you you're too conceited? You're no more than an Infected. You've never experienced for yourself what truly constitutes a Sarkaz life.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You simply sit on the side and watch. What makes you think you can truly comprehend our pain, our resentment?!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It's true, I might not be able to comprehend.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... the fire that blazes in your hearts, it's burned since the distant past into the present, from the first razing of Kazdel to today in Londinium, and even now, it's still within me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It burns. It burns incomparably true, truer than any illusion that words or Arts could conjure.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Say your piece as you please, Infected.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I know how this power of yours originates.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Once a lie is spun, it will not be any less of a lie, no matter how convinced the liar is of it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sarkaz, Infected...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter how you identify each one of us, we're all just ordinary people wanting to live through the unjust circumstances we're put in.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But Theresis has brought everyone into a hopeless war—look at the Victorian dukes' armies outside the city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All it takes is for them to point their lances the same way—it could be Kazdel, it could be Londinium, but all that awaits the Sarkaz then is ruin.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter what you're using to spur them on—bloodlines, authority, renown... it's those that are the total lies!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When did you reform your energy and make some scant space?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I was not wrong, Cautus.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: —You are very dangerous.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Your power, your speech... It may be unable to shake our mightiest soldiers, but it certainly brings our enemies the delusion of hope. I don't want them struggling any further.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You have no choice but to stop here. I won't ever let you enter this city again—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But I will crush flat this cage of yours!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cage? I'm not even sure it lives up to that.
Huh...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Someone's altering the density of my Arts?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Wait, it's you again...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Doctor, am I a little late here?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Finding a route through Londinium's city walls, well... that's tough, even for me.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Lucky I found a few outstanding helpers.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.options: Amiya, we're switching battlefields.;Closure, position drones.;Feist, zipline.

attributes.content: Minutes before...
Doctor, I've locked onto Manfred.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Uh, barely anybody's with him...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: He's not scared of us approaching him.

attributes.content: You think he's overpowered? He looks like he eats fights for breakfast. Maybe Theresis taught him a bunch of moves.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Can we seriously pound him into stopping the artillery like a good boy with just five minutes?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No, scratch that, no I in this we. At this point, you can't count me and Feist as part of your combat force. Throwing Logistics guys into this fray'd be a hell of a way to waste lives.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Amiya, you're all we've got...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Manfred is a powerful enemy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we've faced powerful enemies to come all this way... and we'll surely face more still.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Amiya, you keep all of Manfred's attention.;Closure, Feist, ready our retreat from the tower.;The one we're waiting for is almost here.

attributes.content: Reprising old tricks? Did you really think I'd let you all escape a second time?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: A thread of energy comes rushing in, as if it's locked onto some position in the air.
You almost feel the point of that sword slice at the tip of your feet.
Until a shield comes down in front of you all.
Drop any thoughts of pursuing them, Sarkaz.
Your fight is right here.
White Wolf. I didn't imagine you would come face me again.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: So this passage is bidirectional, what a surprise. You sent them away, and brought yourself in at the same time?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It wasn't me... It was us.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Behind Horn, a soldier stands up.
And then a second, and then a third.
And now over a dozen Victorian soldiers block the Sarkaz general's way.
All of them, camouflages dropped.
They wear a dizzying array of different uniforms, the majority scarred in the roiling flames of war, some covered in mud and cobweb, some splattered by the blood of their own comrades.
Their weapons are just as motley, some still holding regulation swords, some instead toting self-fashioned crossbows.
But their faces all bear an identical vigor.
This time, they stand firm or fall once and for all. They will never retreat.
A gaggle of leftover forces thinks they can beat me?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You aren't fit to fight me, even with a weapon.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Have you forgotten you owe your last escape from my grasp entirely to that Rhodes Island Sarkaz meddler?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You can stop checking all around, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: When you don't respect your opponent on the battlefield, you're the first to fall.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Your blabbering may well be more stubborn than your shield.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Hrrgh––
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Watch the enemy's attack angle! Assemble behind me!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I wasn't planning to eliminate you, but I didn't know you would be so eager to hold your own funeral.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Here I thought you'd have some level of tactical prowess, White Wolf.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You bring a platoon of wounded men to resist me, and have your soldiers give up their lives one after another? Is this your so-called professional spirit?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Don't... forget where you're stood right now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: This is the city wall of Londinium.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Don't go assuming you've already conquered her, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: —See for yourself.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We're still right here.
attributes.name: Horn
